newsitem.title: USA: Investors up Grow Biz stake to 7.66 pct.
newsitem.headline: Investors up Grow Biz stake to 7.66 pct.

text.p: Minneapolis investors Sheldon and Terry Fleck said Wednesday that they raised their stake in Grow Biz International Inc to 479,000 common shares, or 7.66 percent of the total outstanding.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the Flecks said they bought 103,600 shares of the company's stock between Oct. 10 and Nov. 21 at prices ranging from $8.81 to $9.31 a share.
